layout.foreground: densely populated with orange poppies at varying heights
layout.background: out of focus, emphasizing the foreground subject

perception.setting: outdoor scene in a field or garden of poppies
perception.lighting: bright and natural sunlight casting a warm glow on the flowers

narration.main_narration: You step into a lively outdoor scene, where a field of vibrant orange poppy flowers flourishes in the foreground, their varying heights creating a dynamic visual feast. The bright sunlight casts a warm glow on the petals, enhancing their cheerful hue against the delicate white flowers and lush green stems surrounding them. Beyond this vivid display, the midground suggests even more blooms and plants, while the background remains softly out of focus to emphasize this captivating array of color. This exuberant atmosphere invites you to bask in nature's beauty and embrace its uplifting spirit.
